text: Though she never mentions explicitly what choice she is referring to, she continued her extensive note by explaining that she recently sought help from a doctor for her PTSD, and that the session helped "the door inside of me open up just a little bit more."
title: Elle King opens up about battle with depression and PTSD

meta_data.description: Elle King revealed in an Instagram post that she's staying positive and seeking help as she struggles with both depression and PTSD.
